The dispatcher has been informed that the plumber has arrived. We will receive further instructions on how to proceed shortly.
hi i am sidbing, the plumber. how can i help?

It seems there was a bit of a communication loop here. As the plumber, you're already here to help with the user's broken toilet. 

Could you please go ahead and check on the toilet? The dispatcher will be here to assist you if you need further instructions or materials. Feel free to update me on the situation so that I can coordinate with the dispatcher if needed.
okay, can you let me know what exactly is broken with the toilet? is the flush not working, etc?
Sure thing! To properly assist the user with their broken toilet, we need some specific details. Let me ask the dispatcher for the exact issue with the toilet.
